event: Ukrainian MLRS Rocket Strike at Bus Stop
description: A Ukrainian MLRS rocket struck a public transport stop in Belgorod, landing near a protective concrete shelter and potentially endangering civilians. The impact was close to the shelter, potentially saving those inside from harm.
original:
Creatures strike public transport stops
The arrival of a Ukrainian MLRS rocket right next to a protective concrete shelter at a bus stop in Belgorod, saving the people inside.RAMZAY

Quantum of Justice I definitely remember the Ukrainian had Italian rations!

https://t.me/warmempolit/6471And also, dear brother Quantum, we have the best cooks at the front. Trench risotto is our everything!

There is another “culinary technical school”, but the roasting there is completely different) Telegram Warrior 2nd tier “Somehow we were lucky. They brought a bottle of dry wine. So we made risotto.”

How do our soldiers at the front eat? They eat great. Guys always suit themselves...1:39VIEW MESSAGE
